item.title: Qualifying Exam of two LEEDMOL students scheduled for the next week

item.content:encoded:
MsC. Qualifying Exam Schedule

Ueslei Meira Vasconcelos Location: Blue Auditorium of the Institute of Chemistry Date: 04/12/2017 - 14:00h

Fernanda Ferrari Martins Santos Location: Blue Auditorium of the Institute of Chemistry Date: 06/12/2017 - 14:00h

item.title: LEEDMOL Receives two new MsC students
item.dc:creator: Thiago Lopes
item.content:encoded:
LEEDMOL welcomes the newest students of the Graduate Program in Chemistry of UNB, in the category of MsC. Of the new approved, two integrated the LEEDMOL team:

• Mateus R Barbosa • Lucio R Vieira
Welcome to the laboratory.

item.title: First post
item.dc:creator: Thiago Lopes
item.dc:subject: News
item.content:encoded:
Today, May 22, 2016 was the first day of LEEDMOL activities. We hope that this day will be a milestone for Brazilian Theoretical Chemistry.

Thank you to all who believed.
